experience.title: ML/SDE Intern
experience.description: â€¢Worked on a prototype for generating medical reports based on doctor-patient conversation.â€¢Utilized the Named Entity Recognition Model to pick up important medical terms from the conversation between doctor and patient.â€¢Trained various classification models to predict the diet and medicines for a patient, based on symptoms discussed during the consultation.

projects: [{"title":"Multiplayer Chess Game","start_date":"May 2021","end_date":"Jul 2021","description":"â€¢Desgined and built a multiplayer chess game where multiple players can play tha game at the same timeâ€¢Used the Pygame library to make the user interface and python to develop and design the logic. â€¢Players are matched randomly with each other and can surrender the game any time they want"},{"title":"Quiz Application","start_date":"May 2021","end_date":"Jun 2021","description":"â€¢Implemented an end-to-end Quiz Web Application using Django as a backend.â€¢Used PostegreSQL as the database to store all the data instead of the the default SQLite Database.â€¢Features include ability to review previously attempted quizzes, appear for quizzes varying over several categories and also make custom quizzes"},{"title":"Photo Sharing Platform","description":"â€¢Worked on a photo/blog sharing platform with Django as the web framework.â€¢Features include ability to share photos, write blogs, follow people on the platform to see what they have shared."},{"title":"Sorting Visualizer","description":"â€¢Successfully Implemented a sorting visualizer to visualize all the important comparison based sorting algorithmsâ€¢Used Tkinter, a Graphical User Interface written in python to built the user interface."}]
